column5: It's been so long since I last posted, that I'm struggling with words to express myself    I'm going to try my best to do a great job   Thought I'd share my 2011 season with you all starting with last Fall  Had to renew my firearm license and wasn't going to have my photo taken professionally, so decided to take my own.... please don't laugh    Cropped it to specification and sent it in   Got my card in the mail and was happy about it    Then I started to work on the Fish-o-Thon gift          Late December, tackle a new lake 3 - 4 times for some trout and did not have much luck.... was only able to hook into this    New Years day... My family, only dad missing    been 3 years already    Then came my daughter's bowling tournaments and they were successful in winning the provincial    and get to the National    Daughter's personal best!!!    Me playing.... Raising money for the National    Back to fishing... later in the season, switched lake.... and got into this            My daughter being a model at school... love you sweetie    Later on... Got into a whitie    Then came the injury   OUCH!!!  Burnt hand and fingers with hot wax    Had an icy spring trout opener... managed one    Sugar bush is always a treat.... random pics        The garden and deck.... random pics                        Then came a great looking laker    Mom moved to a retirement home and she was quite happy in that pic!!!    Random shots inside            Me.... Brake time      Over looking to the North      Daughter getting her prize.... end of bowling season!!!      Summer came around and got into a nice whitie    Daughter and team in Saskatchewan for the National    Got Hector out of the way and relocated to a safer environment    Then it was my birthday in July      Then my wife's birthday in July    Family weekend - random pics

Daughter's braces came off.... the before and after      Great family time with Jean Marc Parent the humorist        Came fall and haven't gone fishing much since late July but was quite happy to harvest the apples in great numbers!!!      Found a great apple sauce recipe!!!    Some shots that my wife took of the sun effect    This is my favorite    That's about all for now.... Hope you enjoyed!!! Leechman
Wow. You rock Leechman!
cool  thanks for sharing
nice laker!!!
Quite a year Jacques!!! Way to go Bud.
You have a beautiful family Jacques.....Congrats to your daughter on her bowling milestones.  Thanks for sharing  Cheers  Craig
Fishing, gardening and the quality family time, quite a year you had:)
awesome year leech congrats
very nice -thanks for sharing
Hey! You got the whole family in there, Jacques! The only one missing is mon oncle Horace!  Great picture essay, thanks for sharing.
2011 aint over yet!

Thanks Remastered!!!   Thanks Terry!!!   Thanks northernpike56!!! It sure is   Thanks Paul!!!   Thanks Craig!!!  I'll make sure Melissa get's your message   Thanks Dusky!!!   Thanks Corvy!!!   Thanks Rob V!!!   Thanks Roy!!!   I know l2p but hunting will kind of get in the fishing way
Great recap of the year Jaques looks like it has been a great one for your family
Thank Mike!!!  It sure did
This post sums it up Jacques, charity, love, artistry, nature, loyalty and fun....your a top bloke!
Thanks Simon!!!
Really nice recap Jaques.  Some excellent photos of you and the family
Some great pics, thanks for sharing!
Goods stuff Jacques!!  Looks like a great year, my friend!
Thanks Joey!!!  It was a great season over all   Thanks Dan!!!   Thanks FRANKIE!!!  It sure was
